page.title: 07PERSONALITIES OF THE AREA
page.content: Every village has its personalities: people who stand out or are known to most of the inhabitants for one reason or another.We decided on nine people. Mr.D.McLaren, tenant farmer. Mr.P.Willis 1985 F.A. Cup Final Referee,and retired policeman. Mr.R.Harle,largest landowner. Mrs.M.Vann,retired schoolteacher who taught many Brandon inhabitants. Dr.T.Hart,retired doctor of 30 years service. P.C.Carr,the "bobby" for 24 years. Mr.Carver,golf club secretary. Mr.J.Drenon,Brandon's County Councillor who has lived all his life in Brandon. Mrs.Dobson,present owner of Brancepeth Castle.
